long_description: Delectable Chocolate Traveler chocolate wedges come packaged in an attractive tin for added enjoyment. Choose your favorite flavor to satisfy your sweet tooth; each flavor features a different tin. Each tin contains 8 wedges of quality chocolate. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Delectable Chocolate Traveler chocolate wedges come packaged in an attractive tin for added enjoyment.
